amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to prepare, propose, or promulgate any regulation or guidance related to the social cost of carbon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to prohibit the use of funds to prepare, propose, or promulgate any regulation or guidance related to the social cost of carbon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 201 (Roll no. 253).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Gohmert.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 201 (Roll no. 253).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
